titles.title: Expressing profound sorrow on the occasion of the death of the Honorable Gerald R. Ford, thirty-eighth President of the United States of America.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Gerald R. Ford, 38th President of the United States of America. Tenders the deep sympathy of the House to the members of the former President's family in their bereavement.
